title: server issue
body: my client just randomly stops responding and then i get a message saying server error, yet it still counts as a loss in my promos who know i could have won my promos into silver twice over because of this error,and then i have to wait till my game timer hits 0 to search again, by the way i am still using the old client because its better to use

replies.body:
I would recommend at the very least running a client repair, but even better upgrade to the new client. The new client has now been optimised (and has a "potato mode" for older or lower spec computers) and will run better than the old client It will also tend to lag less and is easier to repair if something breaks, which seems to be the problem you are having.

These kind of issues are generally caused by a broken client so a repair or upgrade (or both) should fix it.
